        protected static boolean isAllowed(double x,
                                   double y)
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the position is inside an allowed area, false if it's part of the wall.

      • next

        protected IPosition next(double ox,
                         double oy,
                         double nx,
                         double ny)
        Given the old position of a node and the requested one, this method computes the nearest allowed point.
        Parameters:
        ox - old x coordinate
        oy - old y coordinate
        nx - requested x coordinate
        ny - requested y coordinate
        Returns:
        the allowed point nearest to the requested one

      • moveNode

        public void moveNode(INode<T> node,
                     IPosition direction)
        Description copied from interface: IEnvironment
        This method moves a node in the environment toward some direction. If node move is unsupported, it does nothing.
        Specified by:
        moveNode in interface IEnvironment<T>
        Overrides:
        moveNode in class Continuous2DEnvironment<T>
        Parameters:
        node - The node to move
        direction - The position which will be summed to the current position to move the node in the right place.
